legacy.full_text: A fun moment this photo caught🤩when interviewing Minister of Presidency Khumbudzo Ntshavheni @Khu_Ntshavheni . As women, there is a mutual appreciation btwn us about the hard work we all put for #BRICSSummit2023 . She shared her assessment of this historic summit in Johannesburg https://t.co/X5bWzQmSxf

legacy.full_text:
Catching up with Ebrahim
Patel, Minister of Trade & Industry, SA on the sideline of #BRICSSummit2023 . He suggests the need for infrastructure & industrialization goes hand in hand for South Africa and the African continent. The #GlobalSouth is for green & sustainable development https://t.co/zT7PnPUUsZ

legacy.description: South Africa is Chair of BRICS from 01 January to 31 December 2023.
legacy.name: BRICSza

legacy.full_text: #BRICSza | In his remarks, H.E Xi Jinping President of the People’s Republic of China 🇨🇳 highlighted that Artificial Intelligence is a new frontier of the world, & BRICS has agreed to establish an AI study group for information exchange & cooperation #BRICSza #BRICSSummit2023 https://t.co/lmMcnPtrrR
Forward- looking agenda crucial for #BRICS especially when #BRICSSummit2023 focuses on #GlobalSouth voice in international governance, which #AI  is already a big part of it.

legacy.description: Based in Beijing, Fmr. Washington Correspondent, now Anchor of TV show WorldInsight, Young Global Leader @wef , China National Mental Health Ambassador

legacy.full_text: Opening ceremony #BRICSSummit2023  SA President elaborated on important agenda, on global governance, sustainable developement, global financial &  payment system not manipulated by geopolitics. Common prosperity & progress is needed, as BRICS   embraces calls of #GlobalSouth https://t.co/fJP0yENx5q

legacy.full_text: In Pretoria, reporting on China - South Africa relations. Two Presidents met, came up w. agreements, like establishing manufacturing center s in SA near minerals and raw  materials production places, energy cooperation, esp. new energy, etc. #BRICSSummit2023 #GlobalSouth https://t.co/4Yt2C8pkeB

legacy.full_text:
Wonderful conversation w. Sakina in the morning on #SABC.  A good journalist asks great questions on China, #BRICS , jobs.  I enjoyed the intelligent & meaningful discussion. https://t.co/WxSgilw7sL
The team made me feel at home, thanks! Let real talks continue. #BRICSSummit2023 https://t.co/BJYrWYywwj

additional_media_info.title: UN Official on multilateral solutions to DEVELOPMENT for Global South
additional_media_info.description: The Global South has been calling for bigger roles in global governance, especially today in front of intertwined challenges. UN official says  multilateral solutions are urgently needed today.

additional_media_info.title: UN Official on multilateral solutions to DEVELOPMENT for Global South
additional_media_info.description: The Global South has been calling for bigger roles in global governance, especially today in front of intertwined challenges. UN official says  multilateral solutions are urgently needed today.

legacy.full_text: As the world's challenged by intertwined crises, the #GlobalSouth calls urgently for bigger roles in global governance. On eve of #BRICSSummit2023 , I talked to @UN Undersecretary-General @HaoliangXu @UNDP He says multilateral solutions urgently needed, and development's crucial! https://t.co/bA3QoAQ3KO

legacy.full_text: Finally arrived in Johannesburg, South Africa, after more than 24 hours on the road. #BRICSSummit2023 is to take place here as SA is the rotating host country in 2023. It's believed more than 40 countries with heads of state are to participate, an big occasion of #GlobalSouth https://t.co/eVB5PwrpSS

legacy.full_text: .@SecYellen 's presser Sunday. 30 mins long, rich information, few rhetorics~ a concrete China trip. I shouted out a question on what specific mechanism & channel for continuous &  stable communication btwn China & U.S. at the end of presser, she politely listened yet no response https://t.co/n9jAVCHi2d

Best wishes to him & friends! https://t.co/lQj4ydP4A6

additional_media_info.title: U.S. Has NO Political Will to Deal with its Debts YET
additional_media_info.description: Prof. Eswar Prasad analysed U.S. reluctance to deal w. its sky-rocketing debt problem. But he stopped short from commenting on the concerns of others about the possible "weaponization of U.S. dollar"

additional_media_info.title: U.S. Has NO Political Will to Deal with its Debts YET
additional_media_info.description: Prof. Eswar Prasad analysed U.S. reluctance to deal w. its sky-rocketing debt problem. But he stopped short from commenting on the concerns of others about the possible "weaponization of U.S. dollar"

legacy.full_text: U.S. still has no political will to deal w. its skyrocketing debt? Even that means the U.S. dollar faces more competition & doubts from rest of the world? Eswar Prasad @Cornell explained his observation, but stopped short from commenting on possible "weaponization of U.S. dollar" https://t.co/XRXDDUOwVT

additional_media_info.title: "Mr. Currency" on Dollar v.s. other Currencies, such as RMB
additional_media_info.description: Prof. Eswar Prasad analyses the reality of DOLLAR v.s. RMB Yuan, prior to U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen's visit to China.

additional_media_info.title: "Mr. Currency" on Dollar v.s. other Currencies, such as RMB
additional_media_info.description: Prof. Eswar Prasad analyses the reality of DOLLAR v.s. RMB Yuan, prior to U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen's visit to China.

legacy.full_text: With U.S. @SecYellen 's visit to China, discussion about DOLLAR as world's dominating currency once again becomes focus of debate. I talked to Prof. Eswar Prasad @Cornell #AMNC23 , he analysed dollar's reality versus rising emerging economies' currencies, such as RMB. https://t.co/piqeg2VEkD
